scripts.start-thor-solo:
echo 'Starting thor solo node ...
' && docker compose up -d --wait && echo '
Thor solo node started'
scripts.stop-thor-solo:
docker compose down && echo '
Thor solo node stopped'
scripts.pretest:integration: if [ $RUN_BY_ROOT_PACKAGE -eq 1 ]; then echo 'Thor solo already executed by root package.json...'; else yarn start-thor-solo; fi
scripts.posttest:integration: if [ $RUN_BY_ROOT_PACKAGE -eq 1 ]; then echo 'Thor solo will be stopped by root package.json...'; else yarn stop-thor-solo; fi
